name: design_books_fast_company
description: Fast Company asked some of the world's top design schools to share their favorite books. Here's what they recommend for your reading list.

name: best_fiction_of_2018_new_york_times
description: The New York Times tracks print and electronic sales for all fiction books. This is a list of every book that's hit the #1 spot in 2018.

name: best_nonfiction_of_2018_new_york_times
description: The New York Times tracks print and electronic sales for all non-fiction books. This is a list of every book that's hit the #1 spot in 2018.

name: childrens_books_caldecott_award
description: The Caldecott Award annually recognizes the best American picture book for children. This is a list of every award winner for the past fifty years.

name: pbs_black_authors
description: PBS (the Public Broadcasting Service) lists eleven essential African American authors. This is a list of their most popular books.

name: powells_books_women_authors
description: Powell's Books of Portland, Oregon—the second most popular bookstore in the US—lists twenty-five essential woman authors. This is a list of their most popular books.

name: books_gafa_leaders
who_pretty: Larry Page, Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg, & Steve Jobs
description: The leaders of GAFA (Google, Amazon, Facebook, and Apple) recommend their favorite business and fiction books. Read on to learn which books Larry Page, Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg, and Steve Jobs loved.
